title: Nami isn't really meta... Perhaps it is time to buff her?
body:
As the title says...

{{champion:267}} is currently sitting at a 50%-53%:
http://na.op.gg/champion/nami/statistics/support
http://www.lolking.net/champions/nami#/overview
http://champion.gg/champion/Nami/Support?league=

Buffs:

Q: Aqua Prison

Cooldown decreased from 12/11/10/9/8 to 8 all ranks

W: Ebb and Flow

Mana costs decreased from 70/85/100/115/130 to 40/60/80/100/120

E: Tidecaller's Blessing

Now reduces the enemy target's armor by 15% per attack

replies.body:
Wie should also change her ultimate:

R: Tidal Wave

Now executes enemies below 40% health.
that would be too weak, make it 75%
Still too weak, make it 99% leave that 1% so people cant use no counterplay excuse

Friends, I feel that we are on the way to make Nami slightly imbalanced here. Okay, let's try to think like Riot's professional balance team and...mhm...increase mana cost for Q by 5 on all levels?

Whadd'ya think?
4.9 so the one tricks don't start chaos

Why buff her? if anything, if her win actually is 53%, she might have to be nerfed.

Why not just buff Teemo so HE is tier 1 meta?
Wasnt he t1 when the runes got released?

> [{quoted}](name=Timethief49,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AvtwgN0t,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-12-28T09:09:36.424+0000)
>
> Wasnt he t1 when the runes got released?

No, people were just finding more excuses to hate Teemo.
pretty sure this is a troll post guys relax

Might I suggest adding % MAX HP magic damage somewhere in her kit?  

{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
Just because a champion isn't meta doesn't mean they need buffs.  If you said the same thing about any Assassin that isn't meta right now I guarantee that you would be at 30 downvotes at the least.
Nami is well rounded and fine, stop.

Her heals are stupid right now and with runes to make mana less of an issue she can sustain forever.  Me and my support chunked her and an Ezreal to 25% under tower, and by the time the next minion wave came they were both somehow almost full HP.  Unkess you're going to nerf those heals in don't want to see that shit buffed.

By buffing her you make Riot nerf her in other parts. Are you okay with that? At least Nami is still satisfying to play for many. Pros look highly of Nami and her potential as well. Lets not make her get a nerf bat.

A champion not being meta doesn't mean they need buffs. There are 134 different champions; not all of them can be considered meta at one given point of time. Her winrate is fine. Infact it's better than fine. It's on the high end of the spectrum compared to other winrates.
You dont need to shove a good champion into the meta just because. Thats how you get power creep
